tool.name: OpenSwathMzMLFileCacher
tool.description: This tool caches the spectra and chromatogram data of an mzML to disk.
tool.command:
OpenSwathMzMLFileCacher
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_convert_back: -convert_back #if " " in str($param_convert_back): "$param_convert_back" #else $param_convert_back #end if #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #if " " in str($adv_opts.param_force): "$adv_opts.param_force" #else $adv_opts.param_force #end if #end if #end if
tool.help:
This tool caches the spectra and chromatogram data of an mzML to disk.
For more information, visit
